Wrapper functions which allows to call the CUDA implemented Smith-Waterman algorithm from other C files.

Parameters:
match costs for a match
mismatch costs for a mismatch
genome_sequences_on_host array of genome sequences
read_sequences_on_host array of read sequences
genome_offsets stop positions of each genome sequence in the genome array
read_offsets stop positions of each read sequence in the read array
edit_offsets stop positions of each edit matrix in the edit matrix array
genome_pos_array start positions per read in the reference genome
direction_array holds the direction and matching qgram(s) of each hit
error allowed error
total_genome_array_size total size of the genome array
total_read_sequence_array_size total size of the read array *
total_edit_matrix_size total size of the edit matrix array
do_reverse forward or reverse direction
read_id_array hods the id of each read in the set
sample_size size of the sample arrays
